alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Ransom, southern Cass and northwestern Richland Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Casselton to near Barrie to Enderlin. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horace, Kindred, Davenport, Walcott, Leonard, Sheldon and Hickson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 47 and 55. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 328 and 329. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
